segments.text: Yes . I like cooking very much . I got this hobby when I was 12 years sold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have no idea . I like cooking by myself . I like to taste delicious food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And I love trying new recipes , which I usually test with my friends . You can come , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I hope I can have a chance to taste it . Don't forget to tell me .
segments.speaker: S1
